snippet: Under scrutiny from China, Nepal said it would not allow the body of Shamar Rinpoche, a high lama in Tibetan Buddhism, to be cremated on its territory.
abstract: Nepal's government says it has retracted its permission to allow cremation of Shamar Rinpoche, prominent spiritual figure in Tibetan Buddhism, to be held on its territory; officials say China played no part in reversal, although Nepal has long held to 'one China policy.'
lead_paragraph: Under scrutiny from China, Nepal said it would not allow the body of Shamar Rinpoche, a high lama in Tibetan Buddhism, to be cremated on its territory.

headline.main: Nepal Retracts Permission for Tibet Monk’s Cremation
headline.print_headline: Nepal Retracts Permission for Tibet Monk’s Cremation
